info.title: Tago
info.description: Tago provides easy connection of electronic devices with external data to drive smarter decisions using contextual analysis.

get.description: This operation returns a list of devices associated with your Tago account.
This operation returns the data from a given device on Tago.

parameters.name: qty
parameters.description: Maximum number of data to be returned.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone the device is located in.

post.description: This operation is used to post new data to Tago.
This operation triggers a flow when the variable that matches a given condition is posted.

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: A condition on how to evaluate the value.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Use ‘False’ or ‘True’ for a boolean value. Use double quotes for a string value. Example – \“my string\”

device.title: Device
device.description: Choose a device or enter the device id (max. of 100 devices will be shown).

variable.description: Name of the variable you are tracking.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: Choose a timezone. Default is UTC.

serie.description: Unique sequence identifier for this data. Example: 0001

unit.description: Unit associated with the value of the variable.

device__in_query.name: device
device__in_query.description: Choose a device or enter the device id. (max. of 100 devices will be shown)
